value.name: TikToker Nakia Smith Schools Users on ‘Black American Sign Language’: ‘It’s Got Seasoning’
value.description: English is not my first language,” writes Texas native Nakia Smith on her TikTok account. The 22-year-old African-American woman, who has been deaf since birth, uses her large following on social media to celebrate her little-known dialect: Black American Sign Language (BASL).
